NV newspage
header.description: Fügt eine neue Seite zum Board hinzu, auf der eine einstellbare Anzahl von News angezeigt werden. Der Text kann auf eine bestimmte Anzahl von Buchstaben gekürzt werden. Die Buttons (ändern, zitieren,... und Benutzerbuttons) können ausgeschalten werden.
Adds a extra-page to the board where a switchable number of news are displayed. The text can be shorten to a certain number of chars. Also the Icons can be switched of (post icons, user icons)

changelog.change: [Change] phpBB target-version raised to 3.0.10 (Bug: #935)
[Change] Update TMT to version 1.1
[Fix] ICQ profile link leads to a webservice that is no longer active (Bug: #937)
[Fix] Clean language files (remove some old and wrong strings) (Bug: #936, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Fix] Add categories to pagination (Bug: #929, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Change] phpBB target-version raised to 3.0.9 (Bug: #814)
[Fix] PHP Notice: Undefined variable: user_cache, when post was edited by a different user (Bug: #796)
[Fix] Issue in Trim-Message-Tool with []-brackets that are no BBCode (Bug: #795)
[Feature] Use php-installer feature of MODx 1.2.5 and fix some other XML issues. (Bug: #780)
[Feature] Use Trim-Message-Tool to correctly trim posts in their lenght without breaking BBCodes. (Bug: #779)
[Change] Remove the tailing year after the month at the archiveblock. (Bug: #794)
[Change] Change order of archive-blocks. (Bug: #786)
[Feature] Display a little notice at the News-Info, when there is a poll in the topic. (Bug: #610)
[Feature] Archive-block per year (Bug: #770, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Feature] "Categories" added (Bug: #697, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Feature] "Show Attachment"-Option (Bug: #766, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Fix] Add "IN_INSTALL" to installer to avoid the "delete install/" message. (Bug: #778, Patch by: Un1matr1x)
[Fix] Correctly close BBCodes when shorttening the text. (Bug: #530)
[Fix] Attachments are displayed, although user does not have the required forum-permissions (Bug: #777)
[Fix] Merged css-changes into css-file (Bug: #769)
[Fix] Intersect News-Forums array and Permissions array before doing the SQL-query to make it less heavy. (Bug: #768)
[Fix] sql_in_set-error when the forum does not contain any news or the user can not read any forum. (Bugs: #611, #649)
[Fix] MOD-Validation-Report
[Feature] View pagination in archive
[Feature] Display number of archive-entries (Bug: #527)
[Fix] Make it work with phpBB 3.0.0
[Feature] Option to hide profile information.
[Feature] Option to hide post buttons (quote, edit, delete, ...).
[Feature] Add support for subsilver2
[Feature] Option to trim the news-message to a given length.

Clear your cache in the "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "General" > "Purge the cache"
